tool_description:
unofficial api
get all investing.com stocks realtime data in multi language and filters
name: investing financial stocks
title: investing financial stocks

api_list.name: filters
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://investing-financial-stocks.p.rapidapi.com/screener/filters"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "investing-financial-stocks.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://investing-financial-stocks.p.rapidapi.com/screener/filters"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "investing-financial-stocks.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: chart data (deprecated)
api_list.description: get latest chart data by equity pair id  (provided in screener result)

required_parameters.name: interval
required_parameters.description: can be ( P1D - P1W - P1M - PT5H - PT1H - PT30M - PT15M - PT5M )

api_list.name: stock candlestick
api_list.description: get stock  candlestick table by slug

api_list.name: all equities list ( long load )

earnings
dividends

api_list.name: politics news
coronavirus news
world news
economy news
economic indicators news
market stocks news
commodities news
forex news
latest popular
api_list.description: get all latest popular articles news

api_list.name: chart
api_list.description: get chart data by any pair id

optional_parameters.name: interval
optional_parameters.description: default is P1D means per 1 day

api_list.name: crypto info
api_list.description: get crypto all info page by slug name

required_parameters.name: slug
required_parameters.description: get it from all crypto the name but slugged

api_list.name: info

required_parameters.name: symbol
required_parameters.description: get from majors price or performance

api_list.name: list

optional_parameters.description: get from screener/filters in id from sectors list

optional_parameters.description:
get from filters ranges but 
**max is required with min of every range**
